Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary choice to assign a specific User Story to a specific Sprint.

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary choice to assign a specific Task to a specific Worker.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary choice to include a specific Feature in a specific Release Plan.

Name: set_user_story_priority
Description: Integer value representing the priority of a User Story (1=lowest).

Name: estimate_story_points
Description: Assignment of story points to a User Story

Name: order_backlog_item
Description: Integer rank for a User Story within the Product Backlog.

Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary choice to assign a specific Team to a specific Project.

Name: set_sprint_duration_days
Description: Integer value for the length of a sprint in business days.

Name: allocate_budget_to_feature
Description: Float value representing the portion of the project budget allocated to a feature.

Name: assign_role_to_worker
Description: Binary choice to assign a specific Role (e.g.
DataType: Developer) to a Worker in a team.

Name: set_task_effort_hours
Description: Float value for the estimated effort of a Task in hours.

Name: choose_scrum_master
Description: Decision to assign a specific Scrum Master to a specific Team.
